string-array.name: familynew_title
string-array.item: Perhe on liimaus.\n\n Meaning:Family is a bonding.
Hän on kuin isä minulle. \n\n Meaning:He was like a father to me.
Äiti haluaa, että tulet myöhästyneelle synttäripäivälliselleni.\n\n Meaning: My mother wants you to come in for my belated birthday dinner.
Hän on veljeni. \n\n Meaning:He\'s my brother
Sally on minulle kuin sisko.\n\n Meaning: Sally is like a sister to me.
Pekka on minun poikani.\n\n Meaning: Pekka is my son.
Eikö sinulla olekin Sonja-niminen tytär? \n\n Meaning:You have a daughter named Sonja, right?
